wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Stretch

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HE_Machine
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
        • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Stretch

  • public class HEM_Stretch
extends HEM_Modifier
    Stretch and compress a mesh. Determined by a ground plane, a stretch factor and a compression factor. Most commonly, the ground plane normal is the stretch direction.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
